channel.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
channel.description: Omfg jagex makes to much updates these days..... Like a few days ago or weeks,dunno,,anyway, they made a update then when we tried getting back on, we couldnt get back on. Had to wait like for a hour or so... In this forum rant about jagex's stupid updates!

item.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

People demanded updates, Jagex is delivering, be happy they care enough to even keep the site up. Sure, I don’t agree with some of their decisions, but its not my game. Enjoy the updates and cherish the determination Jagex has to make Runescape better for all.

I said good day.

Read full topic
item.source: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!

item.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

[quote=“Youtubers99lol, post:1, topic:129483”]Omfg jagex makes to much updates these days…
Like a few days ago or weeks,dunno,anyway, they made a update then when we tried getting back on,
we couldnt get back on. Had to wait like for a hour or so…
In this forum rant about jagex’s stupid updates![/quote]
Has to be the stupidest thing i’ve ever heard.

Read full topic

item.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!

item.description:
@tL wrote:

They update loads, but its a good thing tbh.

You dont see many other mmorpg’s that update as much as jagex do.

item.description:
@dbzmaster555 wrote:

Take BOTS for example they only update like a month or in 2 months they havent’t updated yet so runescape has an actual devoted staff.

item.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Youtubers99lol, post:6, topic:129483”]yeah you guys are right…but…
those updates about useless stuff…
and you say once a week…lol
they make about 1-4 a week which causes the server to crash then it takes a long time
for jagex to fix it. Runescape is just good enough the way it is…
only updates i likr (if u call it that) is the holidays really cuz frankly im not a member on runescpe.[/quote]
updates dont cause server crashes… server crashes are caused by something wrong with the server… not with the new updates.
And even if the server does crash are you telling me you can’t wait for an hour or so for them to get them back up? if not then that is an addiction you need to sort out. anywayses

Read full topic

item.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

PC is better really, but i prefer the old one, because it was easyier finding a 100+ World instead of going on a 40+ Boat. They have made the game easyier, but for not as much XP Each Point, so it’s harder for pures, and it takes more time.

Read full topic
item.source: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!

item.title: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

They update once a week? Thats amazing for a game to do that, you should be very proud to play a game with such a devoted staff.

Kaza:

No, they don’t make that many updates, there have been a few big updates latley, like seers, and the when the login servers were down, that was nothing to do with an update. The only update i think is bad is PC, but other than that, i’m not fussed about updates.

If you read the update, they want the game to be more ‘tactical’. They don’t want people just to have the highest level possible to kill the portals the fastest, they want people to actually strategies when playing this mini game.

Read full topic
item.source: Lmao Jagex makes to much updates!
